description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The sequel to the best-selling XBLI game, AAW2 is a 2.5D retro arcade game. Hundreds of moves, multiple match types, create wrestlers & arenas, up to 10 wrestlers in the ring at once, classic control scheme and so much more.
description.short: The sequel to the best-selling XBLI game, AAW2 is a 2.5D retro arcade game. Hundreds of moves, multiple match types, create wrestlers & arenas, up to 10 wrestlers in the ring at once, classic control scheme and so much more.
